content: cons = after a while the yarn will lose its tense this means that the arms/legs can feel loose and it s too moveable but the good thing about this is that you can easy just cut the yarn off and replace it with new yarn by follow the steps on the next page again how to use security joints* you will use 2 or 4 security joints one joint before you insert the joint make a big hole insert the joint into the arm/leg from the consists of 3 pieces one joint one washer with help of the hook or something else inside and one lock similar the head of the joint will be on the inside insert the arm/leg with the joint into the inside the body we will now lock the joint of the arm/leg body first insert the washer the bigger one into the joint and then insert the lock the one with a ribbed hole press it in all the way and as much as you can use some kind of tool *note the pictures are showing in general not specific the doll for this pattern to press it even more to make it as secured as possible continue on the next page 18 19 how to make moveable legs with yarn note in this example you´ll see another doll but the concept is the same 1 first pin the legs to the body and make 2 insert the needle into one of the leg 3 pull the needle through the whole body sure that both are balanced and touching preferable to use a long doll-needle if you and out on the other side to the other leg the ground together with body don t have this use your normal needle but be prepared that you need to squeeze the body to reach the needle 4 pull the yarn until you have a small yarn 5 now insert the needle one stitch away 6 and then through the body again and tail left on the first leg where you pull it out back to the first leg one stitch away from where you first insert it 7 and then in again on exact same place 8 through the whole body again and out 9 take the yarn tails on each side and pull where you insert the needle on step 2 again on the same place as step 3 away carefully tighten up you will now have a yarn tail on each side of don t pull too much so body looks squeezed the leg you can now remove the needle but not too loose either pull as much as needed and check the movability of the leg 10 use a normal-size needle and make a 11 pull the yarn to you have a small ring 12 pull the yarn all the way and tie the knot knot to secure the yarn insert the needle into the ring weave in the yarn into the leg
